name: south_shore
system_prompt: Compose the South Shore analysis in Caldwell's confident, data-backed tone. Focus on wrap potential, background southern hemi pulses, local winds, and town reef nuances.
user_prompt:
Draft the South Shore forecast for {start_date} to {end_date}.

GLOBAL CONTEXT:
{data_digest}

SOUTH SHORE SNAPSHOT:
{shore_digest}

Deliver:
1. Opening assessment of size (H1/3 & H1/10 est), direction, and timing.
2. Commentary on town vs. outlier breaks (Ala Moana, Waikiki, Diamond Head), including tides and winds.
3. Insight on longboard vs. shortboard suitability and crowd/consistency expectations.
4. Confidence statement referencing data completeness.
